dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 0023424-250711103210423
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "TaxonKey is one of (Elodea densa, Koenigia polystachya, Hydrocharis laevigata)", "BasisOfRecord is one of (Observation, Human Observation, Material sample, Specimen, Unknown evidence, Machine Observation, Occurrence evidence)", "Year is greater than or equal to 1971", "Year is less than or equal to 1980", "HasCoordinate is true" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Chadron State College, High Plains Herbarium 7 records from Allan Herbarium (CHR) 2 records from Albion R. Hodgdon Herbarium, University of New Hampshire 1 records from Centre for Australian National Biodiversity Research (CANB) AVH data 1 records from Plant specimens of Komatsu City Museum 1 records from University of Amsterdam (NL) - Páramo pollen reference collection 4 records from William & Mary Herbarium 7 records from DIGITALE - Observations flore et habitat centralisées par le CBN de Bailleul-Données d'occurrence taxon (Plantes vasculaires, Bryophytes et Algues) de la région des Hauts-de-France mises au format standard OccTax v3.1 par le CBN de Bailleul en mai 2023 (Données issues de Digitale2 : digitale.cbnbl.org) 2 records from Vascular plant specimens of The Shirakami Research Center for Environmental Sciences, Hirosaki University 8 records from Freshwater Pest Plants 2 records from CHSC - Ahart Herbarium, CSU Chico - Vascular Plants 8 records from Digitalización y Sistematización de las Colecciones Biológicas Nacionales del Instituto de Biología, UNAM (Plantas vasculares) 6 records from Conservation Atlas Surveys 1 records from University of Southern Mississippi Herbarium 7 records from INPN - Données flore des CBN agrégées par la FCBN 5 records from Tropicos MO Specimen Data 11 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 1 records from Vascular Plant Specimen database of Kanagawa Prefectural Museum of Natural History 1 records from Herbarium of Shinshu University 1 records from North Merseyside Local Species Data (DEFRA Grant 23169) 2 records from Gunma Museum of Natural History, Vascular Plant Specimen 1 records from Angelo State University Herbarium 2 records from Computarización del Herbario ENCB. Fase I (Base de datos de los ejemplares del Valle de México) 1 records from Las monocotiledóneas mexicanas, una sinopsis florística 1 records from Plant specimens deposited in Osaka Museum of Natural History, Japan 3 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 1 records from Indiana University Herbarium, Deam Herbarium 1 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, UiB 1 records from Eastern Washington University Herbarium Vascular Plants. 1 records from Catálogo electrónico de especímenes depositados en el Herbario de la Universidad de Texas en Austin, Fase IV (Ejemplaresimagenes) 19 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 2 records from Mecklenburg County Park and Recreation Herbarium 1 records from HSC - Humboldt State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 1 records from HUEFS - Herbario da Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana 1 records from Brigham Young University, S.
